title: Day 1178
content:
# Day 1178

Any advanced enough technology is indistinguishable from magic.

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1933348926515536150](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1933348926515536150)](https://miro.medium.com/1*tNL12vaW7bRU1VkDQsnfEQ.png)

Bullish on Bitcoin. Cryptography is a powerful thing. Digital scarcity will cause a paradigm shifting upgrade in society. Especially for those who use these magic tools. ‚ù§

6/12/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
